text:
hi!

I’m having trouble with my custom code workflow actions.
For some reason, it seems as if the input contact data I try to feed the code with (see screenshot) aren’t immediately transferred to the code action (the contacts in question have just been created when the workflow is triggered.

This makes the code action fail, but then it works when I try manually re-enrolling a few hours later. Has anybody else experienced something similar?
I’ve also tried to add a five minute delay and then repeat an identical code block, but this isn’t working either
<@U04P2VBTUET> can you share your custom code?
<@U03REFNRMB3> thanks for this sample.  I didn't realize it would be this complex.  I'm going to set it aside until I can nail down my requirements.
<@U01KM1T7ZU3> sounds good. if you need to talk it out. Just let me know.
